subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Possibly of {{der|zh|aav}} origin ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*(d)kər||tree, plant}} (whence {{cog|mkh-vie-pro|*kəl}} > {{cog|vi|cây}}, {{cog|mtq|câl}}), {{m|mkh-pro|*d₂gəl ~ d₂g(əə)l||trunk; stump}} (whence {{cog|km|គល់||stump; floating log}}, {{w|Monic languages|Proto-Monic}} {{m|und|*t(l)gəl||stump}}).

{{zh-ref|Smith (2011)}} proposes a derivation from {{och-l|荄|root}} with {{w|redundancy (linguistics)|redundant}} nominalizing suffix ''*-n''.
